title: 820: Lose Fat & Build Muscle with Mind Pump (6 Week Fitness Challenge Tips, Tricks & Strategies!)
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin discuss their strategies for winning Mind Pump's 6 Week Fitness Challenge! (Officially started July 9, 2018).

  • Let the SHIT talking begin!! The Mind Pump 6 Week Fitness Challenge is on!! How much ganging up will go on?? (2:10)
  • Do you get irritable or sick when you get hot or overheated? The guys share their mutual despise over the heat in the studio this past week. (6:40)
  • Lose Fat & Build Muscle with Mind Pump (6 Week Fitness Challenge Tips, Tricks & Strategies!) (10:58)
  • Teaching/coaching up the younger crowd. The guys share how much they have enjoyed training around their “younger” co-workers. (33:25)
  • The fun of friendly competition with no ego involved. (36:18)
  • Do you love to win or hate to lose more? (39:10)
  • Is Ronaldo the most popular athlete in the world?? Juventus sold over $60 million of Ronaldo jerseys in just one day. (51:32)
  • Why we as human beings are always looking for controversy. (59:14)

People Mentioned:

  • Dr. Jordan Shallow D.C (@the_muscle_doc)  Instagram
  • Cristiano Ronaldo (@cristiano)  Instagram
  • Joe Rogan (@joerogan)  Instagram

Related Links/Products Mentioned:

  • Mind Pump FREE Resources – Everything You Need to Know to Reach Your Fitness Goals
  • Organifi
    • **Code “mindpump” for 20% off**
  • Rubberbanditz Resistance Band Set
  • Juventus sold over $60 million of Ronaldo jerseys in just one day
  • Joe Rogan “OK Symbol” Post
  • How To Use BPC-157 - Ben Greenfield Fitness

Would you like to be coached by Sal, Adam & Justin? You can get 30 days of virtual coaching from them for FREE at www.mindpumpmedia.com.

Get our newest program, MAPS Split, an expertly programmed and phased muscle building and sculpting program designed to get your body stage ready. This is an advanced program and is not recommended for beginners. Get it at www.mapssplit.com!

Get MAPS Prime, MAPS Anywhere, MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic, the Butt Builder Blueprint, the Sexy Athlete Mod AND KB4A (The MAPS Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com.

Make EVERY workout better with MAPS Prime, the only pre-workout you need… it is now available at mindpumpmedia.com

 

Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you via video instruction on our YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates.

 

Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts!

Have questions for Mind Pump? Each Monday on Instagram (@mindpumpmedia) look for the QUAH post and input your question there. (Sal, Adam & Justin will answer as many questions as they can)
